data.name: MotoGP™22 - VIP Multiplier Pack
data.detailed_description: Purchase the VIP Multiplier Pack to multiply your reputation points and the research data that you will earn in the career mode!
data.about_the_game: Purchase the VIP Multiplier Pack to multiply your reputation points and the research data that you will earn in the career mode!
data.short_description: Purchase the VIP Multiplier Pack and double your reputation points and the research data in the Career mode.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Thai, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 (2 * 3600) - AMD FX-4350 (4 * 4200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640 (2048 VRAM) - Radeon R7 250 (2048 VRAM) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600K (4 * 3800) - AMD FX-9590 (8 * 4700) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4096 VRAM) - Radeon RX 580 (8192 VRAM) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
